Product.Name: Axitinib
InfoFromSelleckchem: Axitinib is a multi-target inhibitor of VEGFR1, VEGFR2, VEGFR3, PDGFRβ and c-Kit with IC50 of 0.1 nM, 0.2 nM, 0.1-0.3 nM, 1.6 nM and 1.7 nM, respectively.

Product.Name: Dasatinib
InfoFromSelleckchem: Dasatinib is a novel, potent and multi-targeted inhibitor that targets Abl, Src and c-Kit, with IC50 of ＜1 nM, 0.8 nM and 79 nM, respectively.

Product.Name: Erlotinib HCl (OSI-744)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Erlotinib HCl (OSI-744) is an EGFR inhibitor with IC50 of 2 nM, >1000-fold more sensitive for EGFR than human c-Src or v-Abl. Phase 3.

Product.Name: Imatinib Mesylate (STI571)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Imatinib Mesylate (STI571) is an orally bioavailability mesylate salt of Imatinib, which is a multi-target inhibitor of v-Abl, c-Kit and PDGFR with IC50 of 0.6 μM, 0.1 μM and 0.1 μM, respectively.

Product.Name: Rapamycin (Sirolimus)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Rapamycin (Sirolimus, AY-22989, WY-090217) is a specific mTOR inhibitor with IC50 of ~0.1 nM.

Product.Name: Y-27632 2HCl
InfoFromSelleckchem: Y-27632 2HCl is a selective ROCK1 (p160ROCK) inhibitor with Ki of 140 nM, exhibits >200-fold selectivity over other kinases, including PKC, cAMP-dependent protein kinase, MLCK and PAK.

Product.Name: Crizotinib (PF-02341066)
InfoFromSelleckchem: PF-2341066 (Crizotinib) is a potent inhibitor of c-Met and ALK with IC50 of 11 nM and 24 nM, respectivley.

Product.Name: KU-55933 (ATM Kinase Inhibitor)
InfoFromSelleckchem: KU-55933 is a potent and specific ATM inhibitor with IC50/Ki of 12.9 nM/2.2 nM, and is highly selective for ATM as compared to DNA-PK, PI3K/PI4K, ATR and mTOR.

Product.Name: Risperidone
InfoFromSelleckchem: Risperidone(Risperdal) is an atypical antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia.

Product.Name: Asenapine
InfoFromSelleckchem: Asenapine inhibits adrenergic receptor (α1, α2A, α2B, α2C) with Ki of 0.25-1.2 nM and also inhibits 5-HT receptor (1A, 1B, 2A, 2B, 2C, 5A, 6, 7) with Ki of 0.03-4.0 nM.

Product.Name: Olanzapine
InfoFromSelleckchem: Olanzapine is a high affinity for 5-HT2 serotonin and D2 dopamine receptor antagonist.

Product.Name: Acetylcholine Chloride
InfoFromSelleckchem: The chemical compound acetylcholine (ACh) is a neurotransmitter in both the peripheral nervous system (PNS) and central nervous system (CNS) in many organisms including humans.

Product.Name: Lapatinib (GW-572016) Ditosylate
InfoFromSelleckchem: Lapatinib Ditosylate (GW572016, GW2016) is a potent EGFR and ErbB2 inhibitor with IC50 of 10.8 and 9.2 nM, respectively.

Product.Name: Dovitinib (TKI-258, CHIR-258)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Dovitinib (TKI258, CHIR258) is a multitargeted RTK inhibitor, mostly for class III (FLT3/c-Kit) with IC50 of 1 nM/2 nM, also potent to class IV (FGFR1/3) and class V (VEGFR1-4) RTKs with IC50 of 8-13 nM, less potent to InsR, EGFR, c-Met, EphA2, Tie2, IGF-1R and HER2. Phase 4.

Product.Name: Cabozantinib (XL184, BMS-907351)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Cabozantinib (XL184, BMS-907351) is a potent VEGFR2 inhibitor with IC50 of 0.035 nM and also inhibits c-Met, Ret, Kit, Flt-1/3/4, Tie2, and AXL with IC50 of 1.3 nM, 4 nM, 4.6 nM, 12 nM/11.3 nM/6 nM, 14.3 nM and 7 nM, respectively.

Product.Name: SB216763
InfoFromSelleckchem: SB216763 is a potent and selective GSK-3 inhibitor with IC50 of 34.3 nM for GSK-3Î± and equally effective at inhibiting human GSK-3Î².

Product.Name: GSK1838705A
InfoFromSelleckchem: GSK1838705A is a potent IGF-1R inhibitor with IC50 of 2.0 nM, modestly potent to IR and ALK with IC50 of 1.6 nM and 0.5 nM, respectively, and little activity to other protein kinases.

Product.Name: AG-490 (Tyrphostin B42)
InfoFromSelleckchem: AG-490 (Tyrphostin B42) is an inhibitor of EGFR with IC50 of 0.1 Î¼M, 135-fold more selective for EGFR versus ErbB2, also inhibits JAK2 with no activity to Lck, Lyn, Btk, Syk and Src.

Product.Name: FLI-06
InfoFromSelleckchem: FLI-06 is a novel inhibitor of Notch signaling with EC50 of 2.3 Î¼M.

Product.Name: Allopurinol
InfoFromSelleckchem: Allopurinol (Zyloprim) is a xanthine oxidase inhibitor with an IC50 of 7.82Â±0.12 Î¼M.

Product.Name: SB203580
InfoFromSelleckchem: SB203580 is a p38 MAPK inhibitor with IC50 of 0.3-0.5 Î¼M, 10-fold less sensitive to SAPK3(106T) and SAPK4(106T) and blocks PKB phosphorylation with IC50 of 3-5 Î¼M.

Product.Name: PI-103
InfoFromSelleckchem: PI-103 is a multi-targeted PI3K inhibitor for p110Î±/Î²/Î´/Î³ with IC50 of 2 nM/3 nM/3 nM/15 nM, less potent to mTOR/DNA-PK with IC50 of 30 nM/23 nM.

Product.Name: Foretinib (GSK1363089)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Foretinib (GSK1363089) is an ATP-competitive inhibitor of HGFR and VEGFR, mostly for Met and KDR with IC50 of 0.4 nM and 0.9 nM. Less potent against Ron, Flt-1/3/4, Kit, PDGFRÎ±/Î² and Tie-2, and little activity to FGFR1 and EGFR. Phase 2.

Product.Name: PF-04691502
InfoFromSelleckchem: PF-04691502 is an ATP-competitive PI3K(Î±/Î²/Î´/Î³)/mTOR dual inhibitor with Ki of 1.8 nM/2.1 nM/1.6 nM/1.9 nM and 16 nM, little activity against either Vps34, AKT, PDK1, p70S6K, MEK, ERK, p38, or JNK. Phase 2.

Product.Name: Torin 2
InfoFromSelleckchem: Torin 2 is a potent and selective mTOR inhibitor with IC50 of 0.25 nM; 800-fold greater selectivity for mTOR than PI3K and improved pharmacokinetic properties. Inhibition of ATM/ATR/DNA-PK with EC50 of 28 nM/35 nM/118 nM, respectively.

Product.Name: LY294002
InfoFromSelleckchem: LY294002 is the first synthetic molecule known to inhibit PI3KÎ±/Î´/Î² with IC50 of 0.5 Î¼M/0.57 Î¼M/0.97 Î¼M, respectively; more stable in solution than Wortmannin, and also blocks autophagosome formation.

Product.Name: Y-27632 2HCl
InfoFromSelleckchem: Y-27632 2HCl is a selective ROCK1 (p160ROCK) inhibitor with Ki of 140 nM, exhibits >200-fold selectivity over other kinases, including PKC, cAMP-dependent protein kinase, MLCK and PAK.

Product.Name: BMS-777607
InfoFromSelleckchem: BMS-777607 is a Met-related inhibitor for c-Met, Axl, Ron and Tyro3 with IC50 of 3.9 nM, 1.1 nM, 1.8 nM and 4.3 nM, 40-fold more selective for Met-related targets versus Lck, VEGFR-2, and TrkA/B, and more than 500-fold greater selectivity versus all other receptor and non receptor kinases. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: OSI-930
InfoFromSelleckchem: OSI-930 is a potent inhibitor of Kit, KDR and CSF-1R with IC50 of 80 nM, 9 nM and 15 nM, respectively; also potent to Flt-1, c-Raf and Lck and low activity against PDGFRÎ±/Î², Flt-3 and Abl. Phase 1.

Product.Name: JNJ-38877605
InfoFromSelleckchem: JNJ-38877605 is an ATP-competitive inhibitor of c-Met with IC50 of 4 nM, 600-fold selective for c-Met than 200 other tyrosine and serine-threonine kinases. Phase 1.

Product.Name: Triciribine
InfoFromSelleckchem: Triciribine is a DNA synthesis inhibitor, also inhibits Akt and HIV-1 with IC50 of 130 nM and 20 nM, respectively; does not inhibit PI3K/PDK1; 5000-fold less active in cells lacking adenosine kinase. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: CYC116
InfoFromSelleckchem: CYC116 is a potent inhibitor of Aurora A/B with Ki of 8.0 nM/9.2 nM, is less potent to VEGFR2 (Ki of 44 nM), with 50-fold greater potency than CDKs, not active against PKA, Akt/PKB, PKC, no effect on GSK-3Î±/Î², CK2, Plk1 and SAPK2A. Phase 1.

Product.Name: Danusertib (PHA-739358)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Danusertib (PHA-739358) is an Aurora kinase inhibitor for Aurora A/B/C with IC50 of 13 nM/79 nM/61 nM, modestly potent to Abl, TrkA, c-RET and FGFR1, and less potent to Lck, VEGFR2/3, c-Kit, CDK2, etc. Phase 2.

Product.Name: BMS-754807
InfoFromSelleckchem: BMS-754807 is a potent and reversible inhibitor of IGF-1R/InsR with IC50 of 1.8 nM/1.7 nM, less potent to Met, Aurora A/B, TrkA/B and Ron, and shows little activity to Flt3, Lck, MK2, PKA, PKC etc. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: AT9283
InfoFromSelleckchem: AT9283 is a potent JAK2/3 inhibitor with IC50 of 1.2 nM/1.1 nM; also potent to Aurora A/B, Abl(T315I). Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: Regorafenib (BAY 73-4506)
InfoFromSelleckchem: Regorafenib (BAY 73-4506) is a multi-target inhibitor for VEGFR1, VEGFR2, VEGFR3, PDGFRÎ², Kit, RET and Raf-1 with IC50 of 13 nM/4.2 nM/46 nM, 22 nM, 7 nM, 1.5 nM and 2.5 nM, respectively.

Product.Name: CUDC-101
InfoFromSelleckchem: CUDC-101 is a potent multi-targeted inhibitor against HDAC, EGFR and HER2 with IC50 of 4.4 nM, 2.4 nM, and 15.7 nM, and inhibits class I/II HDACs, but not class III, Sir-type HDACs. Phase 1.

Product.Name: BX-912
InfoFromSelleckchem: BX912 is a potent and specific PDK1 inhibitor with IC50 of 12 nM, 9- and 105- fold greater selectivity for PDK1 than PKA and PKC, respectively. In comparison to GSK3Î², selectivity for PDK1 is 600-fold.

Product.Name: AEE788 (NVP-AEE788)
InfoFromSelleckchem: AEE788 is a potent inhibitor of EGFR and HER2/ErbB2 with IC50 of 2 nM and 6 nM, less potent to VEGFR2/KDR, c-Abl, c-Src, and Flt-1, does not inhibit Ins-R, IGF-1R, PKCÎ± and CDK1. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: PF-573228
InfoFromSelleckchem: PF-573228 is an ATP-competitive inhibitor of FAK with IC50 of 4 nM, ~50- to 250-fold selective for FAK than Pyk2, CDK1/7 and GSK-3Î².

Product.Name: LY2784544
InfoFromSelleckchem: LY2784544 is a potent JAK2 inhibitor with IC50 of 3 nM, effective in JAK2V617F, 8- and 20-fold selective versus JAK1 and JAK3. Phase 2.

Product.Name: Degrasyn (WP1130)
InfoFromSelleckchem: WP1130 (Degrasyn) is a selective deubiquitinase (DUB: USP5, UCH-L1, USP9x, USP14, and UCH37) inhibitor and also suppresses Bcr/Abl, also a JAK2 transducer (without affecting 20S proteasome) and activator of transcription (STAT).

Product.Name: Forskolin
InfoFromSelleckchem: Forskolin is a ubiquitous activator of eukaryotic adenylyl cyclase (AC), commonly used to raise levels of cAMP in the study and research of cell physiology.

Product.Name: PP121
InfoFromSelleckchem: PP-121 is a multi-targeted inhibitor of PDGFR, Hck, mTOR, VEGFR2, Src and Abl with IC50 of 2 nM, 8 nM, 10 nM, 12 nM, 14 nM and 18 nM, also inhibits DNA-PK with IC50 of 60 nM.

Product.Name: DCC-2036 (Rebastinib)
InfoFromSelleckchem: DCC-2036 is a conformational control Bcr-Abl inhibitor for Abl1(WT) and Abl1(T315I) with IC50 of 0.8 nM and 4 nM, also inhibits SRC, LYN, FGR, HCK, KDR, FLT3, and Tie-2, and low activity to seen towards c-Kit. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: GSK2126458 (GSK458)
InfoFromSelleckchem: GSK2126458 is a highly selective and potent inhibitor of p110Î±/Î²/Î´/Î³, mTORC1/2 with Ki of 0.019 nM/0.13 nM/0.024 nM/0.06 nM and 0.18 nM/0.3 nM, respectively. Phase 1.

Product.Name: TG101209
InfoFromSelleckchem: TG101209 is a selective JAK2 inhibitor with IC50 of 6 nM, less potent to Flt3 and RET with IC50 of 25 nM and 17 nM, ~30-fold selective for JAK2 than JAK3, sensitive to JAK2V617F and MPLW515L/K mutations.

Product.Name: Sotrastaurin
InfoFromSelleckchem: Sotrastaurin is a potent and selective pan-PKC inhibitor, mostly for PKCÎ¸ with Ki of 0.22 nM; inactive to PKCÎ¶. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: AZD4547
InfoFromSelleckchem: AZD4547 is a novel selective FGFR inhibitor targeting FGFR1/2/3 with IC50 of 0.2 nM/2.5 nM/1.8 nM, weaker activity against FGFR4, VEGFR2(KDR), and little activity observed against IGFR, CDK2, and p38. Phase 1/2.

Product.Name: TAE226 (NVP-TAE226)
InfoFromSelleckchem: NVP-TAE226 is a potent FAK inhibitor with IC50 of 5.5 nM and modestly potent to Pyk2, ~10- to 100-fold less potent against InsR, IGF-1R, ALK, and c-Met.

Product.Name: WHI-P154
InfoFromSelleckchem: WHI-P154 is a potent JAK3 inhibitor with IC50 of 1.8 Î¼M, no activity against JAK1 or JAK2, also inhibits EGFR, Src, Abl, VEGFR and MAPK, prevents Stat3, but not Stat5 phosphorylation.

Product.Name: GW441756
InfoFromSelleckchem: GW441756 is a potent, selective inhibitor of TrkA with IC50 of 2 nM, with very little activity to c-Raf1 and CDK2.

Product.Name: BAY 11-7082
InfoFromSelleckchem: BAY 11-7082 is a NF-ÎºB inhibitor, inhibits TNFÎ±-induced IÎºBÎ± phosphorylation with IC50 of 10 Î¼M.

Product.Name: AZ20
InfoFromSelleckchem: AZ20 is a novel potent and selective inhibitor of ATR kinase with IC50 of 5 nM, 8-fold selectivity over mTOR.

Product.Name: RKI-1447
InfoFromSelleckchem: RKI-1447 is a potent inhibitor of ROCK1 and ROCK2, with IC50 of 14.5 nM and 6.2 nM, respectively, has anti-invasive and antitumor activities.

Product.Name: AZ191
InfoFromSelleckchem: AZ191 is a potent and selective DYRK1B inhibitor with IC50 of 17 nM, about 5- and 110-fold selectivity over DYRK1A and DYRK2, respectively.

Product.Name: CEP-32496
InfoFromSelleckchem: CEP-32496 is a highly potent inhibitor of BRAF(V600E/WT) and c-Raf with Kd of 14 nM/36 nM and 39 nM, also potent to Abl-1, c-Kit, Ret, PDGFRÎ² and VEGFR2, respectively; insignificant affinity for MEK-1, MEK-2, ERK-1 and ERK-2. Phase 1/2.
